```{r}
install.packages("DBI")
install.packages("RSQLite")

```

# Load the libraries

```{r}
library(RSQLite)
library(DBI)
```

# Import db file

```{r}
# Connect to the SQLite database
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "C:/Users/Admin/Documents/GitHub/sams/data/raw/sams.db")

# List available tables in the database
tables <- dbListTables(con)
print(tables)

# Send the SQL query for one year and one module
result <- dbSendQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM student_data WHERE year = '2023' AND module = 'Module_1';")

# Fetch the data
data <- dbFetch(result)
print(data)

# Clear the result and disconnect
dbClearResult(result)
dbDisconnect(con)

```
